title: Augmented Risk Prediction for the Onset of Alzheimer's Disease from Electronic Health Records with Large Language Models
details: J Wang, S Ahn, T Dalal, X Zhang, W Pan, Q Zhang… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Alzheimer's disease (AD) is the fifth-leading cause of death among Americans aged 65 and older. Screening and early detection of AD and related dementias (ADRD) are critical for timely intervention and for identifying clinical trial participants. The …
